scenario_text.value:
Then all of us should head back to the school
and regain our strength.

I wanna see how those little terrors are
doing, too!
Uh, just a minute.

Where are Kaito and Dracumon? They were around
here just a second ago.
Huh? What the heck? Kaito?!

Uh, Kaito disappearing on us in a situation
like this doesn’t bode well, does it?
(She’s right... I don’t like this at all.)
Kaito! Can you hear me? Answer us!
Kaito, Dracumon! Where are you?!
Do you know where he could’ve gone, Renamon?
Um, I’m afraid not. Sorry.

I admit I’m the one who brought him here.
Even showed him his vision...

Maybe there’s a hint in that vision. What did
you show him?

I don’t know for sure. I can make an educated
guess, but...

The vision changes depending on what’s in the
viewer’s heart.

It’s based on the most painful memory they
have.

I tempted Kaito here with the promise of
revenge, so the vision he saw was probably...

(No doubt about it... It had to be about
Miu.)

If we don’t do something, that guy’s heart
will be taken over by thoughts of revenge...

The Master could take advantage of that...
Heck, Dracumon could be in danger before that.

True. Dracumon could evolve into a foul
beast just like Lopmon did.

Let’s split up and look for Kaito! If we
don’t hurry, we could be too late!
